attributes.action: Britain to leave the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
This E-Petition is for Britain to leave the EU, stop pumping our taxing into Brussels propping up debt ridden economies, and claim back some rights.
Britain has some of the highest taxes on income, fuel, ciggerettes, alcohol and we pour billions into the EU to prop up countries with lower taxes.
Our families and ancesters fought wars to keep our independance, now the government are giving our proud country away to europe! we want back our freedom! we want to make our own decisions, we are no longer an independant country.
